description: Documentary filmed December 1979 through May 1980 in Los Angeles, California on the hard-core punk rock culture movement that existed at the time. Features a cross-section of some of the prominent Los Angeles bands performing live on stage at The Arena, The Fleetwood, Club 88, Hong Kong Cafe and Cherrywood Studios, including Alice Bag Band, Black Flag, Catholic Discipline, Circle Jerks, Fear, Germs, and X. Also includes some insightful interviews with members of the bands, punk fans and music industry moguls as they discuss their lives, the punk phenomenon and their philosophy on life. WARNING: Contains strong use of language and some violent scenes.
